Hey, I'm Tom.

I'm a Data Scientist living in Philly.

About me

I'm currently working as a Data Scientist at Deloitte, which is where my passion for data and experience with solving business problems converge. Outside of work I love to travel and get a taste of different cultures (both literally and figuratively). I am also pursuing my Masters in Analytics through Georgia Tech. Currently I am trying to start my own freelancing work through my network and websites like Upwork. If you have a project in mind that you need help with, or even if you'd just like to just chat, please reach out!

Let's chat!
